name: Classifieds Script
short_description:
Our PHP Classifieds Script has been developed using best practice search engine techniques, giving your website the best start possible with search engine rankings.  Our Classified Script comes with a responsive design, making your website looks nice on any device.  Our Classifieds Listing Software has lots of built-in features such as Google Maps with street view features, Business Location; Ajax based zip code search and support of multiple payment gateways.

We have been providing services to clients across the globe for the past 12+ years with customer satisfaction. We understood all our clients’ needs. We know client always need user friendly, Ajax based websites. Hence we provide our Classifieds Script with a 100% satisfaction guarantee to our clients based on their expectations. So this would be best for any type of classified Advertisement including Auto, Rentals, Real Estate, Jobs and much more.

Make a Call: India – (+ 91) – 9841300660
summary: It is a complete solution for all kind of classifieds Business
